body_html: @sleighsoft Could you please post the edited the code that works. I'm facing the same issue when trying to export a model using estimator. The method estimator.export_savedmodel(export_dir_base, serving_input_receiver_fn) requires an input receiver function. Where should the placeholder for feeding inputs during inference be placed. How is that placeholder connected to the input pipeline. I'm using tf.data.Dataset for input pipeline.

body: @sleighsoft Could you please post the edited the code that works. I'm facing the same issue when trying to export a model using `estimator`. The method `estimator.export_savedmodel(export_dir_base, serving_input_receiver_fn)` requires an input receiver function. Where should the placeholder for feeding inputs during inference be placed.  How is that placeholder connected to the input pipeline. I'm using `tf.data.Dataset` for input pipeline.
